---

## 📦 Install This Alias

```bash
pip install iamusmanbro
```

This will also install `usman-ghani`, which contains all real logic and utilities.

## 🔥 Tip for CLI Visuals

Once installed, run:

```bash
python -m iamusmanbro
```

🎨 This will show a colorful animated intro of my work and brand.
